verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
How <S%H5704>long<s%> will it be ere ye <S%H7760>make<s%> an <S%H7078>end<s%> of <S%H4405>words<s%>? <S%H995>mark<s%>, and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> we will <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
Wherefore are we <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H929>beasts<s%>, and reputed <S%H2933>vile<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>?

He <S%H2963>teareth<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> in his <S%H639>anger<s%>: shall the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> for thee? and shall the <S%H6697>rock<s%> be <S%H6275>removed<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place<s%>?
Yea, the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%>, and the <S%H7632>spark<s%> of his <S%H784>fire<s%> shall not <S%H5050>shine<s%>.
The <S%H216>light<s%> shall be <S%H2821>dark<s%> in his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, and his <S%H5216>candle<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%> with him.
The <S%H6806>steps<s%> of his <S%H202>strength<s%> shall be <S%H3334>straitened<s%>, and his own <S%H6098>counsel<s%> shall cast him <S%H7993>down<s%>.
For he is <S%H7971>cast<s%> into a <S%H7568>net<s%> by his own <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and he <S%H1980>walketh<s%> upon a <S%H7639>snare<s%>.
The <S%H6341>gin<s%> shall <S%H270>take<s%> him by the <S%H6119>heel<s%>, and the <S%H6782>robber<s%> shall <S%H2388>prevail<s%> against him.
The <S%H2256>snare<s%> is <S%H2934>laid<s%> for him in the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and a <S%H4434>trap<s%> for him in the <S%H5410>way<s%>.
<S%H1091>Terrors<s%> shall make him <S%H1204>afraid<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, and shall <S%H6327>drive<s%> him to his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
His <S%H202>strength<s%> shall be <S%H7457>hungerbitten<s%>, and <S%H343>destruction<s%> shall be <S%H3559>ready<s%> at his <S%H6763>side<s%>.
It shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H905>strength<s%> of his <S%H5785>skin<s%>: even the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> his <S%H905>strength<s%>.
His <S%H4009>confidence<s%> shall be rooted <S%H5423>out<s%> of his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, and it shall <S%H6805>bring<s%> him to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1091>terrors<s%>.
It shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, because it is <S%H1097>none<s%> of his: <S%H1614>brimstone<s%> shall be <S%H2219>scattered<s%> upon his <S%H5116>habitation<s%>.
His <S%H8328>roots<s%> shall be dried <S%H3001>up<s%> beneath, and <S%H4605>above<s%> shall his <S%H7105>branch<s%> be cut <S%H5243>off<s%>.
His <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and he shall have no <S%H8034>name<s%> in the <S%H6440%H2351>street<s%>.
He shall be <S%H1920>driven<s%> from <S%H216>light<s%> into <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and <S%H5074>chased<s%> out of the <S%H8398>world<s%>.
He shall neither have <S%H5209>son<s%> nor <S%H5220>nephew<s%> among his <S%H5971>people<s%>, nor any <S%H8300>remaining<s%> in his <S%H4033>dwellings<s%>.
They that come <S%H314>after<s%> him shall be <S%H8074>astonied<s%> at his <S%H3117>day<s%>, as they that went <S%H6931>before<s%> were <S%H270%H8178>affrighted<s%>.
Surely such are the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of the <S%H5767>wicked<s%>, and this is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of him that <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> not <S%H410>God<s%>.
